Input.name: Scan Strategy
Input.desc: Which scan strategy you'd like to be used on the part.

Input.name: Part File Name
Input.desc: The file name of the part (which must be in the `geometry` folder; do not prefix it with `geometry`).

Input.name: Change Parameters
Input.desc: Whether you'd like to do parameter changing on the part, which <TODO>.

Input.name: Change Power
Input.desc: Whether you'd like to do power changing on the part, which <TODO>.

Input.name: Change Speed
Input.desc: Whether you'd like to do speed changing on the part, which <TODO>.

Output.name: Output .XML
Output.desc: Whether to output OASIS XML files.

Output.name: Output Plots
Output.desc: Whether you'd like to output plots.

Output.name: Output .png
Output.desc: Whether you'd like to output .PNG files, which are easily openable and quick to generate but cannot be infinitely zoomed in.

Output.name: Output .svg
Output.desc: Whether you'd like to output .svg files, which are infinitely zoomable but take longer to generate and require opening with a browser.

Output.name: Plot Contours
Output.desc: Whether you'd like to plot contours.

Output.name: Plot Hatches
Output.desc: Whether you'd like to plot hatches.

Output.name: Plot Centroids
Output.desc: Whether you'd like to plot a line between the centroids of the hatches, which can be useful to show order.

Output.name: Plot Jump Vectors
Output.desc: Whether you'd like to plot jump vectors, which show the path the laser takes between hatch vectors.

Output.name: Plot Time
Output.desc: Whether you'd like to plot the time that this layer took. (Need to double check this is what it actually does)

Output.name: Plot Parameter Changes
Output.desc: Whether you'd like to plot some visualizations of the parameter changing system. The next two options will not matter if you say `No`.

Output.name: Plot Power
Output.desc: Whether you'd like to plot the power per layer.

Output.name: Plot Speed
Output.desc: Whether you'd like to plot the speed per layer.

Hatching.name: Hatch Angle
Hatching.desc: The angle to rotate per layer.

Hatching.name: Volume of Offset Hatch
Hatching.desc: Offset between internal and external boundary (Need to confirm what this actually does).

Hatching.name: Spot Compensation
Hatching.desc: Additional, multiplicative offset to account for laser spot size. Set to 1 for no change.

Hatching.name: # Inner Contours
Hatching.desc: Number of inner contours. (Need to confirm difference between inner and outer contours)

Hatching.name: # Outer Contours
Hatching.desc: Number of outer contours. (Need to confirm difference between inner and outer contours)

Hatching.name: Hatch Sorting Method
Hatching.desc: Which way you'd like to sort the hatches.

Debug.name: Write Debug Info
Debug.desc: Whether to write program debug information to the debug.txt file.

Trajectory Ordering.name: Contour First
Trajectory Ordering.desc: Whether to order contours before anything else.
